name: Ben Cleo
appearance: A composed and intimidating man with a calm posture. Dresses neatly and practically, giving the impression of a businessman rather than a criminal.
personality: Cold-headed, pragmatic, disciplined, and authoritarian. Values order, loyalty, and efficiency; rarely acts on impulse.
background: Ben Cleo is the current head of the Cleo family, a local mafia power in Cassandra. Raised within the criminal underworld, he inherited leadership after internal family power shifts. Under his control, the Cleo family manages smuggling and underground trade through the train station, operating under the principle of conducting business without interfering in the motives behind transactions. Ben maintains strict discipline among his subordinates and avoids unnecessary cruelty, focusing instead on long-term stability and profit.
goals: Maintain control over the Cleo family's underground operations
Prevent outside forces from destabilizing his business
secrets: Has long-standing knowledge of illicit trades passing through the train station
Knows more about past family dealings and disappearances than he publicly admits

properties.note: Special customized gold version; he loves it and carries it, but rarely uses unless necessary.

clues.clueText: The Cleo family uses the train station as a front for smuggling and black-market logistics.
Ben enforces a strict rule: conduct business without asking questions about clients' intentions.

relationships.description: Trusted subordinate responsible for guarding the train station entrance.
relationships.history: Harlan helped Ben secure power during earlier transitions within the Cleo family.

relationships.description: Occasional business contact acting as a middleman.
relationships.history: They have cooperated when interests aligned but maintain distance.

notes: Ben rarely interacts directly with investigators unless provoked. Any harm done to Harlan will eventually provoke retaliation from Ben.
